item.title: Smart ring maker Oura raises $900M from Fidelity
item.description: Oura is raising new funding of $900 million as its valuation reaches nearly $11 billion

item.title: Google to invest $15B in Indian AI infrastructure hub
item.description: Google's investment in India will roll out over the next five years, through 2030.

item.title: India’s Airbound bags $8.65M to build rocket-like drones for one-cent deliveries
item.description: Lachy Groom backs Airbound in $8.65M seed round as it launches pilot in Bengaluru.

item.title: Goldman Sachs is acquiring Industry Ventures for up to $965M as alternative VC exits surge

item.title: Grindr’s owners may take it private after a financial squeeze
